parameters.content:
## How it works

This workflow generates a complete onboarding package with 4 personalized documents: welcome letter with first-day logistics, comprehensive benefits guide, IT setup instructions with role-specific equipment, and required forms (emergency contacts + direct deposit). All documents are converted to PDF, archived to Google Drive in an employee folder, and emailed as a single package. HR gets a Slack notification when complete.

## Setup steps

1. **Configure webhook** - Connect from your HRIS (BambooHR/Workday) or ATS
2. **Customize company data** - Edit branding and policies in "Validate & Enrich Data" node
3. **Add HTML to PDF API** - Get key at htmlcsstoimage.com (1-5¬¢ per document)
4. **Connect Google Drive** - Authenticate for document archival
5. **Connect Gmail** - Authenticate for employee delivery
6. **Add Slack webhook** - Get URL from Slack for HR notifications
7. **Test with sample employee data** before production use

üí° **Required data:** firstName, lastName, email, jobTitle, department, startDate

## Input & Smart Processing

Receives employee data from your HRIS, validates required fields, generates unique employee IDs, maps departments to office locations, detects role type (tech/sales/management) for customized equipment and training.

## PDF Processing

Organizes all 4 documents into array with numbered filenames (1_Welcome, 2_Benefits, 3_IT, 4_Forms), then batch converts to professional print-ready PDFs.

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate Welcome Letter HTML const item = $input.first().json; const html = `
${item.companyName}

${item.companyAddress}

${item.companyPhone} | ${item.companyWebsite}

Welcome to ${item.companyName}!

${item.currentDate}

Dear ${item.fullName},

On behalf of everyone at ${item.companyName}, I am thrilled to welcome you to our team! We are excited to have you join us as ${item.jobTitle} in our ${item.department} department.

Your skills, experience, and enthusiasm impressed us throughout the hiring process, and we are confident that you will make significant contributions to our organization's success.

üìÖ Your First Day Details

Start Date: ${item.startDateFormatted}
Reporting Time: 9:00 AM
Location: ${item.location}
Office: ${item.officeFloor}, Reception Area
Dress Code: ${item.dressCode}
Parking: ${item.parkingSpot}

What to Bring on Your First Day:

  • Valid government-issued photo ID (driver's license or passport)
  • Social Security card or proof of eligibility to work
  • Completed new hire documents (included in this package)
  • Direct deposit information (bank routing and account numbers)
  • Emergency contact information

üë§ Your Manager and Team

Direct Manager: ${item.managerName}
Manager Email: ${item.managerEmail}
Manager Phone: ${item.managerPhone}
Department: ${item.department}
Work Schedule: ${item.workSchedule}

Your First Week:

During your first week, you will participate in our comprehensive onboarding program, which includes:

  • Company orientation and culture overview
  • IT setup and equipment allocation
  • Benefits enrollment session
  • Department introduction and team meetings
  • Workspace setup and facility tour
  • One-on-one meetings with key stakeholders
    • ${item.requiresManagementTraining ? '
  • Management training and leadership orientation
    • ' : ''} ${item.requiresSalesTools ? '
  • Sales tools training and CRM setup
    • ' : ''}
${item.benefitsEligible ? `

üè• Benefits Information

As a ${item.employmentType} employee, you are eligible for our comprehensive benefits package starting on ${item.benefitsStartDate}. You will receive detailed information about:

  • Health, dental, and vision insurance
  • 401(k) retirement plan with company match
  • Paid time off (PTO) and holidays
  • Life and disability insurance
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Employee wellness programs
` : ''}

Questions Before Your Start Date?

If you have any questions or need assistance before your first day, please don't hesitate to contact our HR department:

${item.hrContactName}
Email: ${item.hrContactEmail}
Phone: ${item.hrContactPhone}

We look forward to seeing you on ${item.startDateFormatted} and watching you grow with ${item.companyName}. Welcome aboard!

Warm regards,

${item.hrContactName}
Human Resources Department
${item.companyName}

${item.companyName} | ${item.companyAddress}

This letter is confidential and intended solely for ${item.fullName}

`; return { json: { ...item, welcomeLetterHtml: html } };

// Generate Benefits Enrollment Guide HTML const item = $input.first().json; const html = `
${item.companyName}

Benefits Enrollment Guide

Employee: ${item.fullName} | ID: ${item.employeeId}

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Enrollment Information

Enrollment Deadline: You must complete your benefits enrollment within 30 days of your start date.

Coverage Effective Date: ${item.benefitsStartDate}

Enrollment Portal: benefits.${item.companyWebsite}/enroll

üè• Health Insurance

Medical Coverage Options

  • PPO Plan: Comprehensive coverage with network and out-of-network options. Premium: $150/month (employee), $400/month (family)
  • HMO Plan: Lower cost option with network providers. Premium: $80/month (employee), $250/month (family)
  • HDHP with HSA: High deductible plan with Health Savings Account. Premium: $50/month (employee), $180/month (family)

Company Contribution: ${item.companyName} covers 80% of employee premiums and 60% of dependent premiums.

Dental Coverage

  • Preventive care covered at 100%
  • Basic procedures covered at 80%
  • Major procedures covered at 50%
  • Premium: $25/month (employee), $60/month (family)

Vision Coverage

  • Annual eye exam covered at 100%
  • $150 allowance for frames or contacts
  • Premium: $10/month (employee), $25/month (family)

üí∞ Retirement Benefits

401(k) Retirement Plan

  • Eligibility: Immediate enrollment upon hire
  • Company Match: 100% match on first 3% of salary, 50% match on next 2%
  • Maximum Match: 4% of annual salary
  • Vesting Schedule: Immediate vesting for employee contributions, 3-year cliff vesting for company match
  • Investment Options: 20+ mutual funds, target-date funds, and self-directed brokerage

üèñÔ∏è Time Off Benefits

Paid Time Off (PTO)

  • Vacation Days: 15 days per year (pro-rated first year)
  • Sick Days: 10 days per year
  • Personal Days: 3 days per year
  • Paid Holidays: 11 federal holidays
  • Accrual: PTO accrues bi-weekly starting from your first day

üõ°Ô∏è Insurance Benefits

Life Insurance

  • Basic Life: 1x annual salary provided at no cost
  • Supplemental Life: Available up to 5x annual salary (employee pays premium)
  • Dependent Life: Optional coverage for spouse and children

Disability Insurance

  • Short-Term Disability: 60% of salary for up to 90 days (company paid)
  • Long-Term Disability: 60% of salary after 90 days (company paid)
  • Supplemental LTD: Available to increase coverage to 70% of salary

üìö Additional Benefits

Professional Development

  • $2,000 annual budget for training and conferences
  • Tuition reimbursement up to $5,000 per year for approved programs
  • LinkedIn Learning access for all employees
  • Internal mentorship and coaching programs

Wellness Programs

  • Gym membership reimbursement up to $50/month
  • Employee Assistance Program (EAP) for confidential counseling
  • Annual wellness screenings at no cost
  • Healthy snacks and beverages in break rooms

Work-Life Balance

  • Flexible work arrangements (hybrid schedule available)
  • Remote work equipment allowance
  • Commuter benefits and transit subsidies
  • Employee discount programs

üìã Next Steps for Enrollment

  1. Review all benefit options carefully
  2. Log into the benefits portal at benefits.${item.companyWebsite}/enroll
  3. Use your employee ID (${item.employeeId}) and temporary password sent separately
  4. Complete enrollment by selecting your coverage options
  5. Designate beneficiaries for life insurance and 401(k)
  6. Submit enrollment before deadline: ${item.benefitsStartDate}

Questions? Contact HR at ${item.hrContactEmail} or ${item.hrContactPhone}

${item.companyName} Benefits Department

This guide provides a summary of benefits. Refer to official plan documents for complete details.

`; return { json: { ...item, benefitsGuideHtml: html } };

parameters.content:
## Storage & Delivery

Archives all 4 PDFs to Google Drive in employee folder for compliance, aggregates them, then sends complete package via email with action items checklist and first-day summary.

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate IT Setup Instructions HTML const item = $input.first().json; const html = `
${item.companyName}

IT Setup & Access Instructions

Employee: ${item.fullName} | ID: ${item.employeeId}

üíª Equipment Allocation

Your IT Equipment Package

The following equipment will be ready for you on your first day:

    ${item.requiresITEquipment ? `
  • Laptop: MacBook Pro 16" or Dell XPS 15 (your choice)
  • External Monitor: 27" 4K display
  • Keyboard & Mouse: Wireless keyboard and ergonomic mouse
  • Headset: Noise-cancelling headset for calls
  • Laptop Stand: Adjustable ergonomic stand
  • Docking Station: USB-C hub with multiple ports
    • ` : `
  • Laptop: Standard business laptop (Dell Latitude)
  • Monitor: 24" display
  • Keyboard & Mouse: Standard wireless set
    • `}
  • Phone: Desk phone with voicemail setup
  • Cables & Adapters: All necessary connectivity items

Equipment Pick-up: Report to IT Help Desk on ${item.officeFloor} at 9:00 AM on your first day.

üîê Your Login Credentials

Username: ${item.firstName.toLowerCase()}.${item.lastName.toLowerCase()}@${item.companyWebsite.replace('www.', '')}

Temporary Password: Will be provided by IT on your first day

‚ö†Ô∏è You will be required to change your password during first login

üîß First Day IT Setup Steps

Step 1: Computer Setup & Login

IT technician will help you:

  • Power on and configure your laptop
  • Connect to company network
  • Log in with temporary credentials and create new password
  • Set up multi-factor authentication (MFA)

Step 2: Email & Calendar Access

Configure your email and calendar:

  • Access Outlook/Gmail at mail.${item.companyWebsite}
  • Set up email signature with your contact information
  • Configure calendar settings and time zone
  • Subscribe to department calendars

Step 3: Essential Software Installation

IT will install or provide access to:

  • Microsoft Office 365: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Teams
  • Slack: Team communication platform
  • Zoom: Video conferencing software
  • VPN Client: For secure remote access
    • ${item.requiresITEquipment ? `
  • Development Tools: IDEs, Git, Docker, etc.
  • Database Access: Production and staging environments
    • ` : ''} ${item.requiresSalesTools ? `
  • Salesforce CRM: Customer relationship management
  • LinkedIn Sales Navigator: Prospecting tool
    • ` : ''}
  • Password Manager: Company-approved password vault

Step 4: Network & Access Setup

Configure network and system access:

  • Connect to WiFi network: ${item.companyName}-Corporate
  • Set up VPN for remote work access
  • Configure printer connections for ${item.officeFloor}
  • Access shared drives and department folders
  • Set up phone extension and voicemail (Ext: TBD by IT)

Step 5: Security & Compliance

Complete mandatory security setup:

  • Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) on all accounts
  • Review and acknowledge IT security policies
  • Complete cybersecurity awareness training (online module)
  • Configure device encryption and screen lock
  • Install antivirus and endpoint protection software

üîó Important System Links

Employee Portal: portal.${item.companyWebsite}
Email Access: mail.${item.companyWebsite}
IT Help Desk: helpdesk.${item.companyWebsite} or ext. 4357 (HELP)
VPN Portal: vpn.${item.companyWebsite}
Password Reset: password.${item.companyWebsite}
Learning Portal: training.${item.companyWebsite}

üìû IT Support Contacts

IT Help Desk: Available Monday-Friday, 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM

Phone: +1 (555) 444-4357 (HELP)

Email: ithelpdesk@${item.companyWebsite.replace('www.', '')}

Slack Channel: #it-support

Emergency After-Hours: +1 (555) 444-9999 (Critical issues only)

‚ö†Ô∏è Important IT Policies

  • All company equipment remains property of ${item.companyName}
  • Never share passwords or login credentials with anyone
  • Report suspicious emails or security incidents immediately
  • Use VPN when accessing company systems remotely
  • Keep software and security patches up to date
  • Lock your computer when away from your desk
  • Do not install unauthorized software without IT approval

${item.companyName} IT Department

For technical assistance, contact IT Help Desk | ithelpdesk@${item.companyWebsite.replace('www.', '')}

`; return { json: { ...item, itSetupHtml: html } };

// Generate Emergency Contact & Direct Deposit Forms HTML const item = $input.first().json; const html = `
${item.companyName}

Emergency Contact & Direct Deposit Authorization

Employee: ${item.fullName} | ID: ${item.employeeId}

üö® Emergency Contact Information

Please provide contact information for individuals to be notified in case of an emergency. List at least two emergency contacts.

Primary Emergency Contact

Full Name:  
Relationship:  
Primary Phone:  
Secondary Phone:  
Email Address:  
Home Address:  

Secondary Emergency Contact

Full Name:  
Relationship:  
Primary Phone:  
Secondary Phone:  
Email Address:  

üí∞ Direct Deposit Authorization

Complete this form to have your paycheck directly deposited into your bank account(s). Direct deposit is mandatory for all employees.

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Please attach a voided check or bank letter confirming your account details. Direct deposit will be activated within 1-2 pay cycles.

Primary Account (Required)

Bank Name:  
Account Type: Checking Savings
Routing Number:  
Account Number:  
Deposit Amount: Entire Net Pay Fixed Amount: $ Percentage: %

Secondary Account (Optional)

Bank Name:  
Account Type: Checking Savings
Routing Number:  
Account Number:  
Deposit Amount: Remaining Balance Fixed Amount: $ Percentage: %

‚úçÔ∏è Authorization and Signature

I hereby authorize ${item.companyName} to initiate credit entries and to initiate, if necessary, debit entries and adjustments for any credit entries made in error to my account(s) indicated above. I acknowledge that the origination of ACH transactions to my account must comply with the provisions of U.S. law. This authority will remain in effect until I notify ${item.companyName} in writing to cancel it in such time as to afford ${item.companyName} a reasonable opportunity to act on it.

Employee Signature:

Date:

Print Name:

${item.fullName}

Employee ID:

${item.employeeId}

üìã Required Documents Checklist

Please ensure you submit the following with this form:

Voided check or bank letter for primary account

Voided check or bank letter for secondary account (if applicable)

Copy of government-issued photo ID

Social Security card or proof of work eligibility

For HR Use Only

Received by: _______________ Date: _______________ Processed by: _______________ Date: _______________

${item.companyName} Human Resources Department

Please return completed form to: ${item.hrContactEmail} or submit in person to HR on ${item.officeFloor}

`; return { json: { ...item, formsHtml: html } };

parameters.content:
## Document Generation

Creates 4 personalized HTML documents: (1) Welcome letter with first-day details and manager info, (2) Benefits guide with enrollment deadlines and plan comparisons, (3) IT setup with role-specific equipment lists, (4) Forms for emergency contacts and direct deposit authorization.

## Tracking & Alerts

Logs delivery in HR system with completion tracking for signature requirements, then sends Slack notification to HR team with employee details and manager assignment confirmation.
